mapper.delete: delete from room where room_number = #{roomNumber} and accom_name = #{accomName} and company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from room where room_number = #{roomNumber} and accom_name = #{accomName} and company_id = #{companyId}
select * from room rm inner join accommodations accom on rm.company_id = accom.company_id and rm.accom_name=accom.accom_name where rm.accom_name=#{accomName}
